ygData.subject: Re: Shield of Slain Unicorn/Duel Wield
ygData.msgSnippet: No, bash is independent of dual wield. Bash and kick do share the same timer, though, so if you re using bash, you won t be able to kick until the bash timer
ygData.messageBody:
No, bash is independent of dual wield. Bash and
kick do share the same timer, though, so if you're
using bash, you won't be able to kick until the bash
timer runs out, and vice versa. So you'll be able to
bash and utilize the benefits of a second weapon; in
this case, a 10/40
piercer.<br><br>Iskandar<br><br>P.S. - In your off hand, I would recommend another
langseax, if not better. Langseaxes are cheap, effective
weapons that can last for quite a long time. The extra ac
on a SOTSU is nice, but it's rather expensive for
it's time, and it might be better to save that money
for another weapon or some crafted. Don't be afraid
to use it if you get it free, etc.; it's not bad.
